paramInformation.label: Change the State of Indicator Light
paramInformation.description: Default status of socket LED is on as indicator when the load is off

options.label: LED on when load is on
LED on when load is off

paramInformation.label: Memory Function
paramInformation.description: Default with memory: the socket status is same as before when power on

options.label: No state memory after pwr failure

paramInformation.label: Switch Mode
paramInformation.description: Edge or Pulse mode or EdgeToggle mode
